SkView::B2FIter

SkView::B2FIter Class Reference

#include <SkView.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 B2FIter (const SkView *parent)
SkView * next ()

Detailed Description

Iterator that will return each of this view's children, in back-to-front order (the order they are drawn). The first call to next() returns the back-most child view. When next() returns nil, there are no more child views.
